title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may long to recapture magical aspects of your childhood now. Perhaps a bit of nostalgia blows into your orbit when you spot memorabilia from your youth, or you just reminisce about a favorite game you used to play. Although you cant be a kid again, you can always be innocent in spirit. If there are young people in your life, introduce them to a fun activity from your past. Or, call up old friends and corral them to do something exciting and silly together. Youre never too old to enjoy yourself when your inner child is ageless. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
